        public void addClient(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws InvalidEmailException,
                      InvalidPasswordException,
                      AlreadyExistException
        Description: This method allows adding a client.
        Parameters:
        name - The client name.
        email - The client email.
        password - The client password - password must be a minimum of eight (8) characters in length and contain at least one (1) character from two (2) of the following categories: uppercase letter (A-Z) and digit (0-9).
        Throws:
        InvalidEmailException
        InvalidPasswordException
        AlreadyExistException
